name: Hungry God
description:
Play the Drag & Drop Game made by us! It was our first Game Jam, but we learned a lot and had fun.

How to play: Find the things shown on the left and throw them in the vulcano. 😄

Description: A relaxing game about pleasing a vulcano god. Just follow his whishes and give him sacrifices so he will thank you with one of five rewards (including pineapples!).

  • Art by Marie 
  • Programming by Nick and Sini
  • Music by mjusiquetoiz
  • Animation by Gabriel
  • Support by Anna
  • Project Lead Fabian

Please give us a Rating or a Comment! 🙂🙃🙂
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/hungry-god
